Instruction: Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and sugar in a bowl. Incorporate 1/2 cup of butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Blend in the buttermilk, knead for 2 minutes on a lightly floured surface. Transfer to an ungreased baking sheet, shape into a 6x6 inch square, and slice into 12 even sections without separating.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown. Remove from oven, let cool slightly, then enjoy the delicious cookies.
